p: On the other hand, there exists a widespread belief among population that herbal products, being from natural origin, are not harmful to health [ 13]. However, medicinal plants can interact with other drugs and thus cause adverse reactions [ 13, 14]. The complete monographs of the German Commission E: Therapeutic Guide to Herbal Medicines includes more than 100 plants historically employed for their therapeutic properties but they are no longer recommended, since scientific evidence has shown potential toxicity or inefficiency [ 15].
